TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ScrollBar/ArrowButton extends System.Object

summary.span: 根據捲動箭號的每個狀態和方向提供 物件。

span.span: Provides objects for each state and direction of a scroll arrow.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個屬性類別會傳回不同的狀態和方向的捲動箭號。Each property of the class returns a for a different state and direction of a scroll arrow. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有所傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將它貼入 Windows 表單中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件，並呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1`方法，從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`做為。Handle the form's event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#65)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#65)]

value.span: ，表示處於停用狀態的下指捲動箭號。

span.span: A that represents a downward-pointing scroll arrow in the disabled state.
